column2: Pasta with a sauce of eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
Chicken Tikka Masala is a dish of chunks of roasted marinated chicken in a spiced curry sauce.
Chocolate Cake is a cake flavored with melted chocolate, cocoa powder, or both.
Egg Salad is a dish made primarily of chopped hard-boiled eggs and mayonnaise.
Fried Rice is a dish of cooked rice that has been stir-fried in a wok or a frying pan and is usually mixed with other ingredients such as eggs, vegetables, seafood, or meat.
